TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializerException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 序列化錯誤可取得行號資訊時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when line number information is available for a serialization error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化程式遭遇錯誤時，會擲回這個例外狀況。This exception is thrown when the serializer encounters an error. 這個例外狀況允許序列化程式傳回有關錯誤位置和類型的資訊。This exception allows the serializer to return information about the location and type of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擲回範例訊息和。The following code example throws a with an example message and a . [!code-cpp[CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CodeDomSerializerExceptionExample/VB/source.vb#1)]
